radiographic_examinations.findings: The lower thorax is unremarkable with no pericardial or pleural effusion. The liver is normal in size with no evidence of hepatic steatosis or focal hepatic lesions. The portal vein, SMV, and splenic vein are patent. Bile ducts show no dilatation. The pancreas is normal without ductal dilatation or lesions. The spleen is normal in size with no lesions. Adrenal glands are normal. Kidneys show T2 hyperintense nonenhancing foci compatible with cysts and mild left pelvicaliectasis. Normal gastrointestinal tract. No lymphadenopathy or osseous lesions, noting multilevel degenerative disc disease in the thoracolumbar spine.
